VSCodeShortcuts.Title: Visual Studio Code Shortcuts
VSCodeShortcuts.Description: These are shortcuts for VSCode. I also included shortcuts for other text editors in the tables below.

Shortcuts.Action: Undo an action
Redo an action
Save changes in a file
Comment out multiple highlighted lines. Works for any language
Duplicate the line the cursor is on below it.

Shortcuts.Shortcut: hover over + Command + shift + p. Then type "Developer: Inspect Editor Tokens and Scope"
Shortcuts.Action: See information about a token. Particularly it's color. Press command + shift + p to close info card.
Indent/Format/Align code
Move the code back a tab space on multiple lines
Delete the line the cursor is on in VSCode
Create a new terminal in VSCode
clear a terminal

Shortcuts.Shortcut: cursor at end of line + command + delete
Shortcuts.Action: Delete the line that the cursor is at the end of
Go to very top of document
Go to very bottom of document

Shortcuts.Shortcut: control + g. Then type line number in search bar
Shortcuts.Action: Search document by line number.
Open side search-bar, to search for key term.
Previews what a Markdown file will look like. Go to md file, then do shortcut.

Shortcuts.Shortcut: Highlight lines, command + k, then f
Shortcuts.Action: Format highlighted code correctly (according to formatting settings)
Highlight all lines in the code document
Create a new window
Allows you to put multiple cursors on lines that aren't directly below or above each other. For multi-line editing.
Create multiple cursors in VS Code that move down every line. For multi-line editing.
Delete the entire line and newline that a cursor is on
Open command search pallette
Open command search pallette
Move a cursor (or multiple cursors) to the end of their line
Move a cursor (or multiple cursors) to the end of their line, and highlight that part of the line.
Swap a line with the line above it
Swap a line with the line below it
When you're typing "tab" will autofill the first text editor suggestion from the list.
Search an entire folder for a word
Open component to Find and replace all instances of a string in an entire folder.

Shortcuts.Shortcut: Command + k + s (press s after holding down cmd + k)
Shortcuts.Action: View Keyboard shortcuts menu vscode. Can create a shortcut
This is a command used to open a folder in VSCode. First change into your directory using "cd" then type "code ." to open it in VSCode. See tip 27 in the (Comp Sci Tips)[/CompSci/CompSciTips] page.
Duplicate the line the cursor is on below it.
Delete the line the cursor is on
Duplicate the line the cursor is on below it.
Multi-line editing
End multiline editing/get cursor back to normal
Search entire folder for keyword
Multi-line editing
Format code
Create new file
Build and run your project
Copy the line you're on below it.
Hover your cursor next to the opening bracket of a code block, then do the above to collapsed it.
Hover your cursor next to the opening bracket of a collapsed code block, then do the above to expand it.

Slack.Title: Slack Shortcuts
Slack.Description: Slack is a commonly used messaging app for SWE jobs.

Shortcuts.Action: Create a code block
Move the cursor out of a code block.
